<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://www.cisco.com/AXL/API/12.5">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ns:updatePhone sequence="?">
         
         <name>SEPDEADDEADDEAD</name>

         <description>TEST PHONE</description>
         

         <lines>
           
            <line ctiid="?">
               <index>1</index>
              
               <label>Parameswaran Narayanan</label>
              
               <display>Parameswaran Narayanan</display>
               <dirn>
                  <pattern>\+918022166686</pattern>
                  <routePartitionName uuid="?">INTERNAL-PT</routePartitionName>
               </dirn>
              
               
            </line>

         </lines>
        

      </ns:updatePhone>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://www.cisco.com/AXL/API/12.5">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ns:updatePhone sequence="?">
         
         <name>SEPDEADDEADDEAD</name>

         <description>Open Desk</description>
         

         <lines>
           
            <line ctiid="?">
               <index>1</index>
              
               <label>Open Desk</label>
              
               <display>Open Desk</display>
             <dirn>
                  <pattern>\+16084337237</pattern>
                  <routePartitionName uuid="?">INTERNAL-PT</routePartitionName>
               </dirn>  
              
               
            </line>

         </lines>
        

      </ns:updatePhone>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
